entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
